thread.title: HSBC in blockchain first with trade finance deal

title: HSBC in blockchain first with trade finance deal
text:
HSBC in blockchain first with trade finance deal 1:02pm BST - 01:42
HSBC says it has performed the world's first trade finance transaction using blockchain technology, a major step in boosting efficiency and reducing errors in the multi-trillion-dollar funding of international trade. David Pollard reports.
